8.
 
Post-Completion:
 
Performance
 
Evaluation
 
●
 
After
 
project
 
completion,
 
a
 
performance
 
evaluation
 
will
 
be
 
conducted
 
for
 
all
 
team
 
members
 
involved.
 
 
●
 
This
 
review
 
will
 
assess:
 
 
○
 
Timely
 
task
 
completion
 
 
○
 
Communication
 
and
 
responsiveness
 
 
○
 
Quality
 
of
 
work
 
 
○
 
Coordination
 
with
 
the
 
PM
 
and
 
team

to
 
Comply
